mapper.update:
update sb_position
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org = #{org,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
position = #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

isrfid = #{isrfid,jdbcType=TINYINT},

update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_at = #{updateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
version = #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sb_position set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, org = #{org,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, position = #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isuse = #{isuse,jdbcType=TINYINT}, isrfid = #{isrfid,jdbcType=TINYINT}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_at = #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_at = #{updateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, version = #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select t.*,t1.name as state_name,t2.name as type_name from sb_position t left join sys_config t1 on t.state=t1.code and t1.type='sb_position_status' and t1.status = 1 left join sys_config t2 on t.state=t2.code and t2.type='sb_position_type' and t2.status = 1
1=1 and t.status = 1
AND t.code like '%#{code}%'
AND t.name like '%#{name}%'
